title: DESERT EAGLE

description.plain: “DESERT EAGLE” is the twenty-second song on Beyonce’s COWBOY CARTER. It is a funky, erotic interlude into the final act of the album. Throughout the song, Beyoncé uses double entendres to express her strong desires for her partner in a vocal performance reminiscent of 2013’s “NO ANGEL” from her self-titled album.

embed_content: Read “DESERT EAGLE” by Beyoncé on Genius
